Refund Policy

Last Updated: November 12, 2025

1. Return Eligibility

Due to the sensitive nature of research peptides, we have a strict return and refund policy. Returns are accepted under the following conditions:

  • Products are unopened and in their original packaging
  • Products have not been exposed to temperature variations
  • Return request is made within 14 days of delivery
  • Product was damaged during shipping or is defective
  • Wrong product was shipped

Important: Opened products, products that have been stored improperly, or products past the return window are not eligible for return or refund.

2. Non-Returnable Items

The following items cannot be returned:

  • Opened or used products
  • Products without original packaging or labels
  • Products purchased more than 14 days ago
  • Products on clearance or final sale
  • Digital products or downloadable content

3. How to Request a Return

To initiate a return, please follow these steps:

  1. Contact our customer service team within 14 days of delivery
  2. Provide your order number and reason for return
  3. Wait for return authorization (RMA) number
  4. Package the product securely in its original packaging
  5. Include the RMA number clearly marked on the package
  6. Ship the item back using a trackable shipping method

Note: Returns without an RMA number may not be accepted.

4. Return Shipping Costs

  • Defective or Damaged Products: We cover return shipping costs
  • Wrong Item Shipped: We cover return shipping costs
  • Customer Remorse: Customer is responsible for return shipping costs

We recommend using a trackable shipping method with insurance. We are not responsible for items lost or damaged during return shipping.

5. Refund Processing

Once we receive and inspect your return:

  • Approved refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days
  • Refunds will be issued to the original payment method
  • You will receive an email confirmation when your refund is processed
  • It may take 5-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account

Restocking Fee: A 15% restocking fee may apply to returns due to customer remorse or order cancellations after shipping.

6. Damaged or Defective Products

If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us immediately with:

  • Clear photos of the damaged/defective product
  • Photos of the packaging
  • Your order number
  • Description of the issue

We will arrange for a replacement or full refund at no cost to you.

7. Wrong Item Shipped

If we shipped the wrong product, please contact us immediately. We will:

  • Send you the correct product at no additional charge
  • Provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item
  • Process the exchange within 3-5 business days

8. Order Cancellations

Before Shipping: Orders can be cancelled for a full refund if they have not yet shipped. Contact us immediately.

After Shipping: Once an order has shipped, it cannot be cancelled. You may return the unopened product following our standard return policy.

9. Exchanges

We do not offer direct exchanges. If you need a different product:

  1. Return the original product following our return process
  2. Place a new order for the desired product
  3. Once we receive and process your return, we will issue a refund

10. Refund Exceptions

Refunds may be denied if:

  • Product is opened or used
  • Return is requested after the 14-day window
  • Product is not in original condition or packaging
  • Return is made without proper authorization
  • Product shows signs of improper storage or handling

11. Contact Customer Service

For return or refund inquiries, please contact:

Evans Peptides Customer Service
30 N Gould St Ste N
Sheridan, WY 82801
Email: customerservice@lifelinkreresearch.com
Phone: +1 714-622-7899
Hours: Monday - Friday (Except Holidays)

12. Disputes

If you have a dispute regarding a refund, please contact us first to resolve the issue. We are committed to working with our customers to find a fair solution.
